profile.profileDescription: Profile for management of specimens and taxonomy

label.name_singular: Attribution CC BY - reuse with attribution
label.name_plural: Attribution CC BY - reuse with attribution

label.name_singular: Attribution-NonCommercial CC BY-NC - reuse but noncommercial
label.name_plural: Attribution-NonCommercial CC BY-NC - reuse but noncommercial

label.name_singular: Attribution-ShareAlike CC BY-SA - reuse here and applied to future uses
label.name_plural: Attribution-ShareAlike CC BY-SA - reuse here and applied to future uses

label.name_singular: Attribution-NoDerivs CC BY-ND - reuse but no changes
label.name_plural: Attribution-NoDerivs CC BY-ND - reuse but no changes

label.name_singular: Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs CC BY-NC-ND - reuse noncommercial no changes
label.name_plural: Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs CC BY-NC-ND - reuse noncommercial no changes

label.name_singular: Media released for one time use, no reuse without permission
label.name_plural: Media released for one time use, no reuse without permission

label.name_singular: Yale Peabody Museum of Natural History
label.name_plural: Yale Peabody Museum of Natural History

label.name_singular: University of Colorado Museum of Paleontology
label.name_plural: University of Colorado Museum of Paleontology

label.name_singular: Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History
label.name_plural: Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: Any additional unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a drop down with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Copyright License
label.description: Choose the appropriate Creative Commons media reuse license
